articles.title: Film show given for Day of Sun
Message to Kim Jong Il from Norodom Sihanouke
Letter to Kim Jong Il from foreign diplomats
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Il from foreign diplomats
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from diplomats in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 On behalf of those diplomats, Stanislaw Skowron, Councillor of the Polish embassy here, conveyed the letter to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from IIJI director general
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from IIJI director general
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, presented a gift to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by the director general on a visit to the DPRK on Wednesday.

articles.content:
Guinean government delegation arrives 
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A Guinean government delegation led by Jean-Paul Aarr, minister of agriculture and stockbreeding, arrived here today on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The delegation was met at the airport by Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of foreign affairs.

articles.title: Guinean government delegation arrives
articles.content:
Chinese government cultural delegation here 
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A Chinese government cultural delegation led by Sun Jiazheng, minister of culture, arrived here today to participate in the 20th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
 It was met at the airport by Kim Jun Han, vice-minister of culture who is also vice-chairman of the festival organizing committee, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
